title: Bug: Killstreak counter operating incorrectly.
body:
I played a bot game this morning, for an easy first win of the day bonus. I got two kills, then died. After I got my next kill, it said I was on a killing spree, even though it wasn't my third kill in a row without dying.

Unless this is how killstreaks work now, I find it kinda weird, and just thought I'd point it out.

replies.body:
Hey Knowing,

After looking over the bot game you played as Pantheon, it looks like you didn't die to a champion but to something else like a monster or tower so your death counted as an Execute. Your kill streak is not broken unless you are killed by another champion.
